General.Name: Hangzhou Biotest Biotech Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Biotest Biotech Co., LTD. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of in vitro diagnostic assays and reagents, and instruments in China and internationally. It offers medical test products for fertility health, cardiology, oncology, inflammation, biochemistry, and various infectious diseases. The company also provides veterinary test kits; fluorescence immunoassay rapid test kits; and other rapid testing kits. Hangzhou Biotest Biotech Co., LTD. was founded in 2008 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
